feed.title: Dockwatch Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dockwatch: v0.5.350
entry.content:
Fix zindex on the container page button group

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Notifiarr/dockwatch/compare/v0.5.349...v0.5.350

entry.title: New release for Dockwatch: v0.6.381
entry.content:
Add support for multiple themes and rewrite the UI to support new themes with light/dark mode Add a way to view the database and schema Add a time endpoint to pull the containers current timezone setting and time Replace invalid DriverOpts with Empty Object Bump nginx from 3.18 to 3.21 Bump PHP from 8.2 to 8.3

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Notifiarr/dockwatch/compare/v0.5.350...v0.6.381

entry.title: New release for Dockwatch: v0.6.384
entry.content:
Some followup changes/adjustments to the previous UI/theme update

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Notifiarr/dockwatch/compare/v0.6.381...v0.6.384

entry.title: New release for Dockwatch: v0.6.403
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Put back the logout button (Closes #56)
  • Enable remote server stats aggregation (#57)
  • Container table adjustments
  • Sort the list of compose files a-z
  • Fix docker.sock perms inside the container by @aptalca in https://github.com/Notifiarr/dockwatch/pull/59
  • Fix count health state only for running containers
  • Fix unchecked containers using wrong value in overview table
  • Fix unhealthy containers showing healthy badge on container page
  • Fix api not setting the active server id causing some endpoints to fail

New Contributors

  • @aptalca made their first contribution in https://github.com/Notifiarr/dockwatch/pull/59

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Notifiarr/dockwatch/compare/v0.6.384...v0.6.403
